scripts.deploy: npm run deploy:infra && npm run deploy:lambdas && npm run deploy:client
scripts.deploy:infra: npx nx run infra-resources:deploy && npx nx run infra-appsync:deploy && npx nx run infra-public-api:deploy && npx nx run infra-services:deploy && npx nx run infra-integrations:deploy && npx nx run infra-services-secondary:deploy && npx nx run infra-bedrock:deploy
scripts.deploy:local: npm run deploy:infra && npx nx run-many --target deploy --projects tag:account:developer --parallel 1
scripts.deploy:version: npm run deploy:version:infra && npm run deploy:version:lambdas && npm run deploy:version:public-api && npm run deploy:version:client && npm run version:upsert
scripts.deploy:watch: concurrently "npx nx run shared-graphql:schema" "npx nx run-many --target deploy:watch --parallel 1000 --projects tag:type:lambda"
scripts.logs: trap 'exit' INT TERM; trap 'kill 0' EXIT; aws logs describe-log-groups --log-group-name-prefix /aws/lambda/ap-$(aws ssm get-parameter --name /system/env --output text --query Parameter.Value || echo 'dev')-${AP_VERSION_ID:-''} | jq -r '.logGroups[].logGroupName' | xargs -I {} -P 0 sh -c 'aws logs tail {} --since 1m --follow' & wait
scripts.start:test-server: npm run start:localstack && npx nx run lambdas-server:start
